nodes.text: Howard : Everybody does have a different view. But where we do have commonality is an understanding that the benefits that we derive from a healthy, functioning environment supports us per se
Michael :  He was saying that even going along with the human utility argument, which you've espoused, it is rather important to us for utilitarian reasons
Howard Davies was saying that even going along with the human utility argument, which George Buskell has espoused, it is rather important to us for utilitarian reasons
